about_the_game:
Al bassel is a turn-based puzzle game where you play as a soldier trying to save his kingdom from foreign invasion. you will strategically maneuver around the battlefield and try to outsmart and outmaneuver your enemies.
Bassel is a soldier trying to serve his kingdom when he starts to notice strange events happening in his kingdom. Bassel uses his quick wits and intelligence to save his king and kingdom from whatever happens next.

in Al bassel you will:
- Play challenging puzzles
- Use different items and weapons to defeat your enemies
- Experience mythologies and history from the history of Arabs
- Defeat or outmaneuver different types of special enemies
- Experience an engaging story with twists and turns and compelling characters and voice acting.

Bassel is a soldier trying to serve his kingdom when he starts to notice strange events happening in his kingdom. Bassel uses his quick wits and intelligence to save his king and kingdom from whatever happens next.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04.4 LTS
  • Processor: ntel(R) Core(TM)2 Quad CPU Q6600 @ 2.40GHz (4 CPUs), ~2.4GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 310
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04.4 LTS
  • Processor: ntel(R) Core(TM)2 Quad CPU Q6600 @ 2.40GHz (4 CPUs), ~2.4GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.9.5
  • Processor: 2.4 Ghz Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 320M 256 MB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X 10.9.5
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.9GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Al Bassel

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or above
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 or AMD® Athlon™ 64 X2
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI™ Radeon™ X700 (256 MB) or NVidia Equivalent (256 MB) or better.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or above
  • Processor: Intel Core™ 2 Duo (3.0 GHz) or AMD Athlon 64 X2 5000+ (2.6 GHz) or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
